src:
Matteo Darmian Masuk Daftar Belanja Inter Milan
01 Nov 2019, 18:20 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Klub Serie A, Inter Milan diberitakan menaruh hati terhadap bek Parma, Matteo Darmian. Mereka diyakini akan mengajukan tawaran untuk eks pemain MU itu di bulan Januari nanti.
Pada musim panas kemarin, Darmian mengambil sebuah keputusan besar. Ia memutuskan kembali ke Italia setelah kesulitan menembus tim utama Manchester United.
Di Parma, Darmian seakan terlahir kembali. Ia menjadi pilihan utama di sisi kanan pertahanan Parma oleh pelatih Roberto D'Aversa.
Performa bek 29 tahun itu diberitakan mulai dilirik Inter Milan. Gazzetta Dello Sport mengklaim bahwa Inter tertarik untuk memboyong sang bek ke Giuseppe Meazza.

Simak rencana transfer Inter Milan untuk Darmian di bawah ini.
text:
Matteo Darmian is on Inter Milan's shopping list
Nov 01 2019, 18:20 by Bola.net
Soccer - Serie A club Inter Milan are said to have a heart for Parma defender Matteo Darmian. They are believed to be bidding for the former Manchester United player in January.
Last summer, Darmian made a big decision. He decided to return to Italy after difficulties breaking into the Manchester United first team.
In Parma, Darmian seemed to be reborn. He became the main choice on the right side of Parma's defense by coach Roberto D'Aversa.
The 29-year defender's performance was reportedly beginning to glance at Inter Milan. Gazzetta Dello Sport claims that Inter are interested in bringing the defender to Giuseppe Meazza.

Check out Inter Milan's transfer plan for Darmian below.
